ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] mez- duration
ygData.msgSnippet: Giants are completely immune to mez series and stuns..... it will say they are mezzed but if you watch them, they are NOT. ... From: Paul Jesernig
ygData.messageBody:
Giants are completely immune to mez series and stuns.....
it will say "they are mezzed" but if you watch them, they are NOT.

----- Original Message -----
From: Paul Jesernig <PWJ@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 8:33 AM
Subject: [eqenchanters] mez- duration


> On most things mez is a fixed duration. All giant class creatures are
highly
> resistant to mez (lasts half as long as on other critters or less). Other
> high level critters are immune to mez also.
>
> Lozi ~Hand of Chaos~, CT
>
>
